resources.string: Game for two players. Each player has red or blue ball and can draw walls of the same color as ball on the game board. The balls hit the walls and get slower or faster. The game ends if balls hit each other or get out of the game board.
Players can draw walls of their color on the gameboard.
The ball moves slower if it hits the wall of the same color.
The ball moves faster if it hits the wall of the opponent\'s color.
The wall breaks after one hit of the same color ball or two hits of the opponent\'s ball.
The game ends if balls hit each other, after 30 seconds, if one ball goes out of the gameboard or stops.
